userStories.title: Verify core runtime npm packages from PRD. Run
userStories.description: Verify core runtime npm packages from PRD. Run: npm install phaser@3.80.1 (verify install resolution only).

userStories.title: Verify build tool dependency from PRD. Run
userStories.description: Verify build tool dependency from PRD. Run: npm install vite@5.0.0 (verify install resolution only).

userStories.title: Verify TypeScript dependency from PRD. Run
userStories.description: Verify TypeScript dependency from PRD. Run: npm install typescript@5.3.0 (verify install resolution only).

userStories.title: Verify no additional UI/styling frameworks are installed; confirm Phaser-only rendering with minimal HTML/CSS. Inspect package.json and ensure no extra UI libs (e.g., react, vue, tailwind) are added.
userStories.description: Verify no additional UI/styling frameworks are installed; confirm Phaser-only rendering with minimal HTML/CSS. Inspect package.json and ensure no extra UI libs (e.g., react, vue, tailwind) are added.

userStories.title: Verify localStorage API availability handling plan
userStories.description: Verify localStorage API availability handling plan: create a quick capability check snippet in docs/devnotes. Add file docs/localStorage-notes.md describing expected warning behavior and fallback.

userStories.title: Scaffold Vite + TypeScript project structure for Phaser app. Create files
userStories.description: Scaffold Vite + TypeScript project structure for Phaser app. Create files: index.html, vite.config.ts, tsconfig.json, src/main.ts, src/game/createGame.ts.

userStories.title: Add base HTML shell and overlay root containers. Update index.html to include
userStories.description: Add base HTML shell and overlay root containers. Update index.html to include: game mount div (#app), overlay div (#overlay-root), and font import for "Press Start 2P" with fallback.

userStories.title: Create global CSS for overlay UI only (no framework). Add src/styles/overlay.css and import it from src/main.ts. Implement palette variables per PRD and default background #0F172A.
userStories.description: Create global CSS for overlay UI only (no framework). Add src/styles/overlay.css and import it from src/main.ts. Implement palette variables per PRD and default background #0F172A.

userStories.title: Create Phaser game config with fixed viewport and pixel-art settings. Implement in src/game/createGame.ts
userStories.description: Create Phaser game config with fixed viewport and pixel-art settings. Implement in src/game/createGame.ts: width/height 1024x768, pixelArt=true, roundPixels=true, physics arcade enabled.

userStories.title: Define TypeScript types for PRD data models. Create src/types/models.ts containing GameState, HighScore, Settings, MazeData types exactly matching PRD fields.
userStories.description: Define TypeScript types for PRD data models. Create src/types/models.ts containing GameState, HighScore, Settings, MazeData types exactly matching PRD fields.

userStories.title: Implement localStorage utility with availability check and namespacing. Create src/storage/storage.ts with functions
userStories.description: Implement localStorage utility with availability check and namespacing. Create src/storage/storage.ts with functions: isLocalStorageAvailable(), loadSettings(), saveSettings(), loadHighScores(), saveHighScores().

userStories.title: Add basic test harness for pure TS logic (no Phaser). Configure vitest in package.json and create vitest.config.ts; ensure tests run in CI-like mode.
userStories.description: Add basic test harness for pure TS logic (no Phaser). Configure vitest in package.json and create vitest.config.ts; ensure tests run in CI-like mode.

userStories.title: Create constants for UI copy, colors, and gameplay defaults. Add src/config/constants.ts with exact strings ("Time's up!", "You escaped!", "New High Score!"), tile size 16, maze size 21, speed 100, timer default 60.
userStories.description: Create constants for UI copy, colors, and gameplay defaults. Add src/config/constants.ts with exact strings ("Time's up!", "You escaped!", "New High Score!"), tile size 16, maze size 21, speed 100, timer default 60.

userStories.title: Implement time formatting utility. Add src/utils/time.ts with function formatMMSS(seconds
userStories.description: Implement time formatting utility. Add src/utils/time.ts with function formatMMSS(seconds:number): string producing "MM:SS" (zero padded). Add unit tests.

userStories.title: Create maze generation module using recursive backtracking with determinism. Add src/maze/generateMaze.ts accepting seed
userStories.description: Create maze generation module using recursive backtracking with determinism. Add src/maze/generateMaze.ts accepting seed:number and returning MazeData (grid 0/1, start [1,1], exit [19,19]).

userStories.title: Implement seeded RNG utility for determinism. Add src/utils/rng.ts with createRng(seed
userStories.description: Implement seeded RNG utility for determinism. Add src/utils/rng.ts with createRng(seed:number) returning nextFloat()/nextInt(min,max). Use a simple LCG or mulberry32.

userStories.title: Add pathfinding solvability validator (BFS) for maze. Create src/maze/validateMaze.ts with hasPath(grid,start,exit) boolean; add unit tests.
userStories.description: Add pathfinding solvability validator (BFS) for maze. Create src/maze/validateMaze.ts with hasPath(grid,start,exit) boolean; add unit tests.

userStories.title: Implement maze generation retry logic on failure. Update src/maze/generateMaze.ts (or wrapper src/maze/createMazeData.ts) to regenerate with new seed and log warning "Maze generation retry with new seed." when validation fails.
userStories.description: Implement maze generation retry logic on failure. Update src/maze/generateMaze.ts (or wrapper src/maze/createMazeData.ts) to regenerate with new seed and log warning "Maze generation retry with new seed." when validation fails.

userStories.title: Implement coin placement after maze generation. Add src/maze/placeCoins.ts selecting 5-10 floor tiles excluding start/exit; coins have IDs "coin_0"..
userStories.description: Implement coin placement after maze generation. Add src/maze/placeCoins.ts selecting 5-10 floor tiles excluding start/exit; coins have IDs "coin_0"..

userStories.title: Create MazeData factory combining generation, validation, coins. Add src/maze/createMazeData.ts returning MazeData with grid, coin_positions, start_position, exit_position, width/height, seed used.
userStories.description: Create MazeData factory combining generation, validation, coins. Add src/maze/createMazeData.ts returning MazeData with grid, coin_positions, start_position, exit_position, width/height, seed used.

userStories.title: Create Phaser Scene skeletons
userStories.description: Create Phaser Scene skeletons: BootScene, MenuScene, GameScene, UIScene (HUD), EndScene. Files: src/scenes/BootScene.ts, MenuScene.ts, GameScene.ts, UIScene.ts, EndScene.ts.

userStories.title: Implement BootScene to preload minimal assets and then start MenuScene. Add placeholder generated textures if real sprites absent (player/wall/coin/exit).
userStories.description: Implement BootScene to preload minimal assets and then start MenuScene. Add placeholder generated textures if real sprites absent (player/wall/coin/exit).

userStories.description: Implement HTML overlay Main Menu UI in src/ui/MenuOverlay.ts that renders title and buttons with specified colors and copy. Hook into MenuScene to show/hide overlay.

userStories.title: Wire Main Menu button handlers. In src/scenes/MenuScene.ts connect overlay callbacks
userStories.description: Wire Main Menu button handlers. In src/scenes/MenuScene.ts connect overlay callbacks: Start Game -> start GameScene+UIScene; High Scores -> open modal; Settings -> open modal; Quit -> attempts window.close and otherwise shows console info.

userStories.title: Create High Scores modal overlay in src/ui/HighScoresModal.ts. Reads top 10 from storage, sorted descending, and renders empty state message with color #64748B.
userStories.description: Create High Scores modal overlay in src/ui/HighScoresModal.ts. Reads top 10 from storage, sorted descending, and renders empty state message with color #64748B.

userStories.title: Create Settings modal overlay in src/ui/SettingsModal.ts with sliders (0-100) for music/sfx and toggle for control scheme. Persist changes immediately via storage.ts.
userStories.description: Create Settings modal overlay in src/ui/SettingsModal.ts with sliders (0-100) for music/sfx and toggle for control scheme. Persist changes immediately via storage.ts.

userStories.title: Implement audio manager with volume controls. Add src/audio/AudioManager.ts to manage music and sfx volumes (0..1), apply Settings immediately, and provide playSfx(name).
userStories.description: Implement audio manager with volume controls. Add src/audio/AudioManager.ts to manage music and sfx volumes (0..1), apply Settings immediately, and provide playSfx(name).

userStories.title: Add coin collect / win / lose SFX placeholders in BootScene and integrate with AudioManager. Store keys
userStories.description: Add coin collect / win / lose SFX placeholders in BootScene and integrate with AudioManager. Store keys: sfx_coin, sfx_win, sfx_lose.

userStories.title: Implement GameState initialization on Start Game. Add src/state/createGameState.ts to create new GameState with level=1, score=0, time_remaining=60, coins_collected=[], maze_seed=random/int.
userStories.description: Implement GameState initialization on Start Game. Add src/state/createGameState.ts to create new GameState with level=1, score=0, time_remaining=60, coins_collected=[], maze_seed=random/int.

userStories.description: Render maze tiles in GameScene using generated MazeData. Create src/game/renderMaze.ts that creates static wall sprites and floor background; tile size 16 and maze centered in viewport.

userStories.title: Create player sprite and physics body in GameScene. Use Arcade physics, set size roughly 12x12 (or 16x16) and position at start_position converted to pixels.
userStories.description: Create player sprite and physics body in GameScene. Use Arcade physics, set size roughly 12x12 (or 16x16) and position at start_position converted to pixels.

userStories.description: Implement smooth player movement at 100 px/s. In src/scenes/GameScene.ts update loop sets velocity based on input; no tile snapping.

userStories.description: Render coins in GameScene from MazeData.coin_positions. Create src/game/renderCoins.ts to spawn physics overlap objects with IDs in data manager.

userStories.title: Implement coin collection overlap handling. In GameScene add overlap between player and coins; on overlap remove coin, increment score, push id to coins_collected; play SFX.
userStories.description: Implement coin collection overlap handling. In GameScene add overlap between player and coins; on overlap remove coin, increment score, push id to coins_collected; play SFX.

userStories.description: Create HUD scene (UIScene) displaying timer left and coins right with semi-transparent background and rounded corners. File: src/scenes/UIScene.ts.

userStories.title: Wire shared state between GameScene and UIScene. Implement src/state/StateBus.ts (simple event emitter) to broadcast time/score updates to HUD.
userStories.description: Wire shared state between GameScene and UIScene. Implement src/state/StateBus.ts (simple event emitter) to broadcast time/score updates to HUD.

userStories.description: Implement countdown timer logic in GameScene. Decrement time_remaining using delta; clamp at 0; emit updates to HUD; use formatMMSS.

userStories.description: Render exit tile/object at MazeData.exit_position. Add src/game/renderExit.ts to place exit sprite with physics overlap enabled.

userStories.title: Implement win condition on reaching exit. In GameScene handle player-exit overlap -> stop gameplay, stop timer, play win SFX, and open EndScene with "Level Complete" UI.
userStories.description: Implement win condition on reaching exit. In GameScene handle player-exit overlap -> stop gameplay, stop timer, play win SFX, and open EndScene with "Level Complete" UI.

userStories.description: Implement lose condition when timer hits 0. In GameScene detect time_remaining==0 -> stop gameplay, play lose SFX, open EndScene with "Game Over" and message "Time's up!".

userStories.title: Wire EndOverlay buttons to actions. In EndScene
userStories.description: Wire EndOverlay buttons to actions. In EndScene: Restart/Play Again starts a fresh game (new seed, reset score/time); Main Menu returns to MenuScene and hides HUD/game scenes.
